keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, July 1 (AP)--The High Command communique said today: The British Channel Island of Guernsey was occupied yesterday by a coup de main [surprise action) of the German Air Force. A German reconnaissance plane shot down two British fighting planes of the Bristol-Blenheim type in an air battle.
